description: Bosch is a global engineering and technology company specializing in the development and production of innovative solutions for smart homes, cities, industries, and mobility. Their product range includes a variety of IoT devices and sensors for applications in automotive, building automation, and industrial environments. All Bosch products are designed and manufactured with a focus on quality, durability, and sustainability. Notable products include the Bosch Parking Sensor, which uses LoRaWAN technology for efficient parking management, and the Bosch CISS (Connected Industrial Sensor Solution), a multi-sensor device for monitoring temperature, vibration, and humidity in industrial settings. With a commitment to smart and sustainable solutions, Bosch empowers digital transformation and connected living worldwide.
